casebody.data:
HARLEYSVILLE INS.
v.
BUZZ OFF INSECT. No. 272A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 13, 2008. David L. Brown, John I. Malone, Jr., Greensboro, Martha P. Brown, for Harleysville Mutual Ins. Co. Mack Sperling, John S. Buford, Greensboro, Cecilia O. Miller, Diana S. Casey, San Diego, CA, for International Garment Tech. Gary K. Sue, Greensboro, Michael A. Hamilton, for Erie Insurance. David Neal Allen, Charlotte, for NC Assoc. of Defense Attys. *902Theodore B. Smyth, Stephen D. Martin, Raleigh, for Property Casualty Insurers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of November 2008 by Property Casualty Insurers Association of America for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of November 2008."
